result.title: sorry from all users that wasted their times
result.content:
in the name of allah, most merciful

i'm amin najafvand.

i'm so sorry about writing somethings that wastes some (participents of codeforces)'s times

it was inhumane work

i promise that from this time i don't write some silly things.

i hope that participents forgive me.

have good time.
